Text.val: 12.11.2014 SH SCR19317 Part2: Added test on non existing CLIT row (type=1) to perform this part
08.04.2013 SH SCR18046 Changed transaction level from program to client level (record level)
05.12.2012 GB SCR17771 Extended condition for allow call the part 2, changed calculation in the task suffix of part 2 for number
05.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
06.04.2010 GB SCR15433 Added calculation for new fields in thr CMON
25.11.2009 GB SCR15085 Removed the Get GNRL_ACTIVEDATE and moved
set the v.DATA to Get GENERAL data
11.08.2005 AK SCR8754 daily update of averages in CMON
02.02.2004 JJ SCR5428 fixed conversion of alpha parameter. VAL() => DVAL()
20.06.2002 JP change type of date parameter to type 304 !!!
21.03.2002 SH SCR1025 The CMOD_DAY will be now updated with DD
-- Loop over all CLIENTs with StatusContract <> 2
-- I don't use a LinkCreate to create new rows in table CMOD, because
it's not sure, if it's possible that there exists rows with the unique key
-- The order sequence, see SPECS, is assured by the index (1)
-- Only when CLNT_ACC_CURR<>ADMN_CURRENCY we have to
update the additional CLIENT_MONTH row with CMON_CURRENCY = ADMN_CURRENCY

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(INVA_ACTAFACTORING) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVA join :1/INVO on INVO_ADMNO = :3 and INVO_CLNTNO = :4 and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and INVO_PAYMENTCODE > 0 and INVO_NO = INVA_NO join :1/PAYC on PAYC_CODE = INVO_PAYMENTCODE and PAYC_SKIPSUSPENDED = 'N' where INVA_CURRENCY = ':2' for fetch only
